TitlePage.Title: polymaking
TitlePage.Subtitle: Interfacing the geometry software polymake
TitlePage.Author:
Marc Roeder
marc_roeder@web.de http://csserver.evansville.edu/~mroeder

The GAP Team
support@gap-system.org
TitlePage.Abstract: This package provides a very basic interface to the polymake program by Ewgenij Gawrilow, Michael Joswig et al. . The polymake program itself is not included.
